example.code:
PS C:\>Get-CCRepositoryList -Order Ascending -SortBy RepositoryName
RepositoryId RepositoryName ------------ -------------- c7d0d2b0-ce40-4303-b4c3-38529EXAMPLE MyDemoRepo 05f30c66-e3e3-4f91-a0cd-1c84aEXAMPLE MyNewRepo
example.description: This example lists all repositories in ascending order by repository name.
